recipe.title: Grandmas Rice Custard
recipe.comment: egg replacer can be substituted in this recipe
recipe.step: In a microwave proof bowl mix together corn flour with a little bit of the milk to form a paste.
Add the rest of the ingredients and whisk well.
Place in microwave on high for 7 minutes, remove from microwave and whisk again.
Place back in microwave for 6 minutes, remove again and whisk.
Keep reducing the time by 1 minute each time and whisk each time until it stars to thicken and set.
This will depend on your microwave.
When a slight skin starts to appear as n top and it becomes thick, is when it is ready.
On the last time whisk again then sprinkle with nutmeg.
Serve hot with cream, milk or ice cream.
